```{r setup, include=FALSE}
list.pkg <- c("flexdashboard", "shiny", "data.table", "dplyr", "plotly", "DT", "leaflet", "lubridate", "magrittr", "tmap", "mapview")
new.packages <- list.pkg[!(list.pkg %in% installed.packages()[,"Package"])]
if(length(new.packages)) install.packages(new.packages, repos = "https://cloud.r-project.org/")
## reqopt <- function(x) require(x, quietly = TRUE)
sapply(list.pkg, require, character.only = TRUE)

## function

preCount <- function(x, y){

  ## x = DB data
  ## y = fylke data
  preDT <- x[y, on = c(fylkeid = "fylke")]

  preDT[, ins10 := N / i.N * 10000] %>%
    .[, ins := N / i.N * 100]

  utCol <- grep("id$", names(preDT), ignore.case = TRUE)
  tabCol <- names(preDT)[-utCol]
  tabName <- c("n", "N", "pr10000", "pr100")
  setnames(preDT, tabCol, tabName)

  preDT[, (tabName) := lapply(.SD, function(x1) round(x1, digits = 1)),
    .SDcols = tabName]

  preDT[is.na(kartID), kartID := 50] #for Trøndelag
  return(preDT)
}

```


```{r load_data}
## load data
mapssb <- readRDS("DiabFylke.RDS")
dt2018 <- readRDS("dt2018.rds")
norgeMapFylke <- readRDS("NorgeMapFylkeID.Rds")
```

```{r reaktiv}

## populasjon
pop_ut <- reactive({

   
  dt <- mapssb[kjonn %in% input$valg_kjonn, ] %>%
    .[age >= as.integer(input$valg_age[1]) & age <= as.integer(input$valg_age[2]), ]

  popDT <- dt[, .(N = sum(N)), keyby = .(fylke, kartID)]
  
  return(popDT)
    
})


## diabetes pop
diab_ut <- reactive({

  if (input$valg_diab != 3){
    dt1 <- dt2018[db12 == input$valg_diab, ]
  } else {
    dt1 <- dt2018
  }
  
  diabData <- dt1[kjonn %in% input$valg_kjonn, ] %>%
    .[age >= input$valg_age[1] & age <= input$valg_age[2], ]

  return(diabData)
  
})


## kart
kart_ut <- reactive({

  utDT <- preCount(diab_ut(), pop_ut())

  kartDT1 <- norgeMapFylke %>% left_join(preDT1, by = c("mapID" = "kartID"))


})

```
